house_listing.house_description: Nice curb appeal. Move-in condition: new roof, new paint, new carpet. Large master bedroom with ac. Enclosed patio room not included in stated sqft being used as rec room. Seller will entertain any offer between $179k-$199k*** fax all offer subject to interior inspection with prequal letter to (760) 875-9637 *** tom (714) 420-3804 email: tnr@juno.Com ***
